mapper.update: update T_TC_AOAC_DOUBT a set (imbalance_result, AC_ENTRY_NO,AC_CUST_ID,AC_ACC_TYPE,AC_ADD_AMOUNT,AC_DEC_AMOUNT,TRANS_NO,ACCOUNT_SUB_ID,AC_TRANS_DATE,AC_TRANS_TYPE,AC_SOURCE_TRANS_NO) =( select 2, AC_ENTRY_NO,AC_CUST_ID,AC_ACC_TYPE,AC_ADD_AMOUNT,AC_DEC_AMOUNT,AC_TRANS_NO,AC_ACCOUNT_SUB_ID,AC_TRANS_DATE,AC_TRANS_TYPE,AC_SOURCE_TRANS_NO from T_TC_AOAC_AC_TMP b where b.AC_TRANS_NO=a.TRANS_NO and b.AC_ACCOUNT_SUB_ID=a.ACCOUNT_SUB_ID and rownum=1 ) where TRANS_NO =#{TRANS_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ACCOUNT_SUB_ID =#{ACCOUNT_SUB_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and imbalance_result=0 and AC_ENTRY_NO is null and exists (select 1 from T_TC_AOAC_AC_TMP b where b.AC_TRANS_NO=a.TRANS_NO and b.AC_ACCOUNT_SUB_ID=a.ACCOUNT_SUB_ID and rownum=1 )
mapper.insert: insert into T_TC_AOAC_imbalance (imbalance_id, acc_date, imbalance_result, trans_no, account_sub_id, bs_cust_id, bs_acc_type, bs_add_amount, bs_dec_amount, bs_status,BS_TRANS_TYPE,BS_SOURCE_TRANS_NO, ac_entry_no, ac_cust_id, ac_acc_type, ac_add_amount, ac_dec_amount, ac_trans_date, ac_trans_type,AC_SOURCE_TRANS_NO) select doubt_id, acc_date, imbalance_result, trans_no, account_sub_id, bs_cust_id, bs_acc_type, bs_add_amount, bs_dec_amount, bs_status,BS_TRANS_TYPE,BS_SOURCE_TRANS_NO, ac_entry_no, ac_cust_id, ac_acc_type, ac_add_amount, ac_dec_amount, ac_trans_date, ac_trans_type,AC_SOURCE_TRANS_NO from T_TC_AOAC_DOUBT
